reviewBlock.lift: Lift from a friend, colleague or relative
reviewBlock.liftMileage: Total distance in miles travelled to or from work each day
reviewBlock.liftJourney: Total number of journeys taken to or from work each day.
reviewBlock.changeTypeOfTravel: How you tell us about your travel
reviewBlock.liftCostText: We'll use the rate per mile quoted in your grant approval letter to work out how much you're paid back.
reviewBlock.employerContributionInsetText: The amount we'll pay back will be less than the total cost you're claiming for. This is because we'll deduct the amounts you or your employer have agreed to pay.
reviewBlock.changeTotalNumberOfJourneys: Total number of journeys for travel to work
